results.title: Periadventitial Delivery of Simvastatin-Loaded Microparticles Attenuate Venous Neointimal Hyperplasia Associated With Arteriovenous Fistula
results.text_hl: There are limited therapies that prevent @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@VNH@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@VS@@@. Systemic delivery of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has been shown to reduce @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@VNH@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@VS@@@ but local delivery may help decrease the side effects associated with statin use.

citations.NLM: Zhao C, Zuckerman ST, Cai C, Kilari S, Singh A, Simeon M, von Recum HA, Korley JN, Misra S. Periadventitial Delivery of Simvastatin-Loaded Microparticles Attenuate Venous Neointimal Hyperplasia Associated With Arteriovenous Fistula J Am Heart Assoc. 2020 Dec 15;9(24):e018418. PMID: 33283594

results.title: Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@venous stenosis@@@ formation in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ hemodialysis vascular access model

results.title: Simvastatin promotes angiogenesis and prevents microvascular remodeling in chronic renal ischemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@RAS@@@ enhanced both intrarenal angiogenesis and peri-@<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ arteriogenesis and increased the expression of angiogenic growth factors and @GENE_HIF1A @GENE_396696 @@@hypoxia-inducible factor-1alpha@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on coronary atheroma: the Multicentre Anti-Atheroma Study (MAAS)
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ on placebo had an increase in mean diameter @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ of 3.6% and the treatment effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was -2.6% (-4.4 to -0.8).

results.title: Effect of apheresis of low-density lipoprotein on peripheral vascular disease in hypercholesterolemic patients with coronary artery disease.
results.text_hl: In the apheresis group, the number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with hemodynamically significant @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenoses@@@ in the aortotibial tract decreased from 9 to 7; in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-only group, the number increased from 6 to 13 (P = 0.002).

citations.NLM: Kroon AA, van Asten WN, Stalenhoef AF. Effect of apheresis of low-density lipoprotein on peripheral vascular disease in hypercholesterolemic patients with coronary artery disease. Ann Intern Med. 1996 Dec 15;125(12):945-54. PMID: 8967704

results.title: Simvastatin and niacin, antioxidant vitamins, or the combination for the prevention of coronary disease.
results.text_hl: The average @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ progressed by 3.9 percent with placebos, 1.8 percent with antioxidants (P=0.16 for the comparison with the placebo group), and 0.7 percent with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@ plus antioxidants (P=0.004) and regressed by 0.4 percent with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@ alone (P<0.001).

Simvastatin and niacin, antioxidant vitamins, or the combination for the prevention of coronary disease. N Engl J Med. 2001 Nov 29;345(22):1583-92. PMID: 11757504

results.title: Simvastatin decreases stent-induced in-stent restenosis rate via downregulating the expression of PCNA and upregulating that of p27kip1.
results.text_hl: The expressions of cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor p27 (p27kip1), @GENE_PCNA @GENE_100339381 @@@proliferating cell nuclear antigen@@@ (@GENE_PCNA @GENE_100339381 @@@PCNA@@@), and @GENE_ACTA2 @GENE_100009271 @@@alpha-smooth muscle (alpha-SM) actin@@@ were measured. RESULTS: In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group compared to the control group, the neointimal thickness, neointimal area, and degree of @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ decreased, while the residual lumen area increased significantly (P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Gao C, Xu W, Xiao W, Yu J, Li M. Simvastatin decreases stent-induced in-stent restenosis rate via downregulating the expression of PCNA and upregulating that of p27kip1. J Interv Cardiol. 2013 Aug;26(4):384-91. PMID: 23941653
